headline: Weapons-Grade Wealth: Why Northrop Grumman Is Built To Outperform
summary: Northrop Grumman ended 2024 with a record backlog of roughly $91.5 billion. Read this article to know what makes NOC stock a reliable income play.

headline: Serco to Acquire Northrop Grumman's Training Services Business
summary: FALLS CHURCH - Northrop Grumman Corporation and Serco Inc., today announced a definitive agreement for Serco Inc. to acquire Northrop Grumman's training services business for $327 million in...

headline: Northrop Grumman: Technological Innovation Can Fuel Future Success
summary: Northrop Grumman's advancements in AI and autonomous systems will drive demand for modern military equipment. Read why NOC stock is a strong long-term investment.
